channel.title: Cloud Computings on
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Computings on

item.description: %% Zoottelkeeper: Beginning of the autogenerated index file list %% üìÑ 1.2. üìÑ 1.2.AWS-Well-Architected-Framework üìÑ AWS üìÑ Endpoint vs Gateway üìÑ SAP Questions üìÑ Well Architected tool üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Application Integration üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Billing üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Compute üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Databases üóÇÔ∏è _Index_IoT üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Migration & Transfer üóÇÔ∏è _Index_ML üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Monitoring üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Networking üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Organizations üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Security & Identity üóÇÔ∏è _Index_Storage %% Zoottelkeeper: End of the autogenerated index file list %%

Amazon DevOps Guru #aws #cloud #CICD AWS Offering Cloud operations service for improving application. operational performance and availability ‚Ä¢ Detect behaviors that deviate from normal operating patterns ‚Ä¢ Benefits: ‚Ä¢ Automatically detect operational issues ‚Ä¢ Resolve issues with ML-powered insights ‚Ä¢ Elastically scale operational analytics ‚Ä¢ Uses ML to reduce alarm noise

Amazon Transcode #aws #cloud A service from AWS to change format of Videos stored in AWS. ‚Ä¢ Transcodes video files to various formats / outputs ‚Ä¢ AWS Elemental MediaConvert is a new service that provides more functionality and may be better for new use cases ‚Ä¢ Some features are only available on Elastic Transcoder such as: ‚Ä¢ WebM (VP8/VP9) input and output ‚Ä¢ Animated GIF output ‚Ä¢ MP3, FLAC, Vorbis, and WAV audio-only output
Amplify #aws #cloud #application A service from AWS to: A set of tools for building fullstack applications Build backend and frontend Amplify studio is a visual interface for building apps.
Amazon API Gateway #aws #cloud #api Amazon API Gateway is a fully managed service in AWS that makes it easy for developers to create, publish, maintain, monitor, and secure APIs at any scale.

App Runner #aws #cloud #containers A fully managed AWS PaaS for deploying Containerized web app and APIs. It creates an container using a source ( ECR or GitHub or etc), it could be linked to ELB, convigured with VPC and CloudWatch for monitoring.
Amazon AppFlow #aws #cloud A fully managed service from AWS that allows you to integrate other SaaS services (Salesforce, Slack) with AWS services like S3, Redshift, Snowflake, etc securely.

AppSync #aws #cloud #GraphQL #application Fully managed service by AWS for development of GraphQL APIs. Automatically scales Uses GraphQL Supports Lambda, DynamoDB and Elasticsearch Server-side caching Fully managed, reduces organization overhead

AWS CLI #aws #cli A CLI tool by AWS to control aws resources via command line. It requires user credentials to perform actions to the account in which the credentials are valid and authorized to perform equivalent console based actions.

AWS License Manager #aws #cloud A managed service by AWS to manage popular software licences like of Windows. ‚Ä¢ Used to manage licenses from software vendors ‚Ä¢ For example, manage your Microsoft, Oracle, SAP and IBM licenses ‚Ä¢ Centralized management of software licenses for AWS and on-premises resources ‚Ä¢ Can track license usage including when licensed based on virtual cores (vCPUs), sockets, or number of machines ‚Ä¢ Distribute, activate, and track software licenses across accounts and throughout an organization ‚Ä¢ Enforce limits across multiple Regions

AWS Systems Manager (SSM) #aws #cloud Manages many AWS resources including EC2, S3, RDS etc. AWS Systems Manager (Systems Manager) was formerly known as “Amazon Simple Systems Manager¬†(SSM)” and “Amazon EC2 Systems Manager (SSM)”.
Cloud Development Kit #aws #cloud #IaC Open source software development framework to define your cloud application resources using familiar programming languages similar to Pulumi in AWS.
CloudFormation #aws #IaC #cloud A templating IaC language to write infrastructure configuration as code offered by AWS.
Device Farm #aws #cloud #application Device farm is a managed service by AWS providing a way to test your mobile and web application by simulating access to your apps from various devices.
EventBridge #aws #cloud A fully managed event management service from AWS also known asCloudwatch-events Cloudwatch Events.
Kinesis vs SQS vs SNS #aws #cloud Kinesis, SQS, and SNS are all streaming services of AWS with fundamental differences like:

Kinesis #aws #cloud #serverless #dataanalytics Family of services to collect, process and analyze streaming data in real-time by AWS. Streaming data is simply data continuously generated by many data sources sending a small amount of information simultaneously.

AWS OpsWorks #aws #cloud A configuration management service provided by AWS for managed instances of Chef and Puppet. It is an alternative to AWS Systems manager for organizations who already use Chef or Puppet.

AWS Resource Access Manager #aws #cloud A fully managed service from AWS to share resources across accounts. AWS Resource Access Manager (RAM) helps you securely share your resources across AWS accounts, within your organization or organizational units (OUs) in AWS Organizations, and with IAM Roles and IAM Users for supported resource types.
AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM) #aws #cloud #serverless A service in AWS to ease the coding of wiring of serverless application without having to create complicated CloudFormation Templates.

Service Catalog #aws #cloud AWS Service Catalog allows organizations to create and manage catalogs of IT services that are approved for use on AWS from virtual machine images, servers, software, and databases to complete multi-tier application architectures.

Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) #aws #cloud Amazon SES is a cloud email service provider in AWS for delivering high volume email campaigns to hundreds of billions of emails per year without any SMTP server.
AWS SNS #aws #cloud #notification A simple service by AWS enabling users to send notifications via SMS, Push notifications, or email.

SQS #aws #cloud #serverless #microservices #decoupleing #queue First-ever AWS service that was made publicly available. (Oldest service).¬†Message Queue service enables web services applications to queue messages.

AWS CLI #aws #cli A CLI tool by AWS to controll aws resources via command line. It requires user credentials to perform actions to the account in which the credentials are valid and authorized to perform equivalent console based actions.

AWS Cost & Usage Report #aws #cloud An AWS Cost management tools which allow you to: ‚Ä¢ Publish AWS billing reports to an Amazon S3 bucket ‚Ä¢ Reports break down costs by: ‚Ä¢ Hour, day, month, product, product resource, tags ‚Ä¢ Can update the report up to three times a day ‚Ä¢ Create, retrieve, and delete your reports using the AWS CUR API Reference

AWS Price List API #aws #cloud An AWS Cost management tool to: ‚Ä¢ Query the prices of AWS services ‚Ä¢ Price List Service API (AKA the Query API) ‚Äì query with JSON ‚Ä¢ AWS Price List API (AKA the Bulk API) ‚Äì query with HTML ‚Ä¢ Alerts via Amazon SNS when prices change
AWS Budgets #aws #cloud A feature in AWS to set custom usage and reservation budgets.
Cost Allocation Tags #aws #cloud A feature in AWS Which allows you to tag your resources which will help you segregate your cost based on environments and groups in aws.

AWS Cost Explorer #aws #cloud A tool from AWS that allows you to view charts of your costs: Uses: ‚Ä¢ You can view cost data for the past 13 months and forecast how much you are likely to spend over the next three months ‚Ä¢ Cost Explorer can be used to discover patterns in how much you spend on AWS resources over time and to identify cost problem areas ‚Ä¢ Cost Explorer can help you to identify service usage statistics such as: ‚Ä¢ Which services you use the most ‚Ä¢ View metrics for which AZ has the most traffic ‚Ä¢ Which linked account is used the most
Cost Management Tools #aws #cloud #cost A suite of tools in aws which allows the user to manage the costs associated with their AWS account.

Application Mirror image (AMI) #aws #cloud #compute #packer AWS Provides a tool to recreate EC2 instances and install dependencies, applications, software and security updates, and configure customization quickly.
Auto Scaling Group (ASG) #aws #cloud #compute A service from AWS to spin up EC2 instances as well as remove them automatically according to the situation.

Bastion #aws #ec2 #cloud #compute also known as Jump-box Bastions are EC2 instances which are security harden. They are designed to help you gain access to your EC2 via SSH or RDP that are in private subnet which are not directly accessible from the internet.
Batch #aws #cloud #compute A batch workload solution by AWS similar to that of Azure Batch. To run scheduled computing job run only once in a certain period usually after the data has been collected.
Compute Optimizer #aws #cloud #compute An AWS service to recommend optimal AWS resources for your workloads to reduce costs and improve performance
AWS Elastic Beanstalk (EB) #aws #cloud A PaaS solution from AWS to make deployment of web apps easier by providing a fully managed environment.
EC2 Spot Instances #aws #compute #ec2 AWS Provides a cheaper alternative compute solution in Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 for non important tasks.
EC2 #aws #cloud #compute The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud, is an AWS platform for providing cloud-based compute capacity. That means it provides virtual machines in the sky.

ECS (Elastic Container Service) #aws #cloud #containers Amazon ECS is a fully managed Container orchestration service by AWS that helps you easily deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications.
EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service) #aws #cloud #Kubernetes #managed-kubernetes-cluster Amazon EKS is a managed Kubernetes service to run Kubernetes in the AWS cloud and on-premises data centers.
EC2 #aws #cloud #compute The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud, is an AWS platform for providing cloud-based compute capacity. That means it provides virtual machines in the sky.

Elastic Load balancer (ELB) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking #loadbalancer Loadbalancer service provided by AWS Elastic Load Balancing supports the following types of load balancers:¬†Application Load Balancers, Network Load Balancers, and Classic Load Balancers.

Elastic Load balancer (ELB) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking #loadbalancer Loadbalancer service provided by AWS Elastic Load Balancing supports the following types of load balancers:¬†Application Load Balancers, Network Load Balancers, and Classic Load Balancers.
Elastic Network Interface (ENI) #aws #cloud #compute #networking A basic network interface functionality provided by AWS to be attached to EC2.
Fargate #aws A fully managed serverless, pay-as-you-go compute engine for Containers that lets you focus on building applications without managing servers in AWS .

Lambda #aws #cloud #serverless #compute #development Run code without provisioning or managing servers in AWS. Lambda executes your code only when needed and scales automatically to a few to a 1000 lambda functions concurrently in seconds.
AWS Lightsail #aws #cloud #compute A pre-configured managed instance solution provided by AWS designed to be low cost and ideal for users with less technical expertise similar to EC2.
Security Groups #aws #cloud Defence In Depth Zero-Trust Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 RDS Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)
Step Functions #aws #cloud Step Functions are a Finite State Machine implementation offered as a serverless service by AWS. Step Functions are made of state machines (workflows) and tasks.
Windows Container Docker on AWS #docker #windows #aws To run windows containers in docker within AWS, launch an EC2with an Windows_Server-2022-English-Core-ContainersLatest-2022.
Amazon Keyspaces (for Apache Cassandra) #aws #cloud #databases #nosql A scalable, highly available, and managed Apache Cassandra‚Äìcompatible database service by AWS.

Amazon Neptune #aws #cloud #databases Fully managed graph database service from AWS with the following features: Build and run identity, knowledge, fraud graph, and other applications Deploy high performance graph applications using popular open-source APIs including( Gremlin, OpenCypher, and SPARQL) Offers greater than 99.

Amazon Timestream #aws #cloud #database #timeseries it is a Time series Database service by AWS for IoT and operational applications which is faster and cheaper than relational databases being serverless.
Amazon Athena #cloud #aws #data-analytics A serverless service from AWS to run SQL queries against data stored in S3 like CSV, TSV, JSON, PARQUET, and ORC formats.

Aurora #aws #cloud #rdbms #serverless #sql Fully managed Postgres or MySQL database by AWS. Combines the speed and availability of high end database with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of opensource databases
AWS Data Exchange #aws #cloud #database AWS Data Exchange is a data marketplace by AWS with over 3,000 products from 250+ providers which supports Data Files, Data Tables, and Data APIs.
AWS Database Service #aws #cloud #databases #rdbms #nosql #graph There are several types of database services in AWS like: Relational Databases: RDS Aurora Relational Database on EC2
AWS Lake Formation #aws #cloud #bigdata #data-lake A Data Lake solution from AWS to set up secure data lakes in days where data can be collected from databases and object storage into S3 Data Lake.
AWS Data Pipeline #cloud #aws #data A managed ETL service by AWS which is used to process and move data between different AWS compute and storage services.
Database on EC2 #aws #cloud #sql #databases #rdbms Create a self managed EC2 instance with manually configured Database if you want full control and ultimate flexibility unlike of RDS.
DocumentDB #aws #cloud #databases #nosql A Fully managed service by AWS for NoSQL database service with MongoDB compatibility. It is highly available and high performance.
DynamoDB #aws #cloud #databases #nosql Key value and document fully serverless database NoSQL solution by AWS which can guarantee consistent read and write speed at any scale.
Amazon Elasticache #aws #cloud #databases A fully managed AWS Implementation of Redis and Memcached. It is a key/value store which is In-memory for high performance reads and low latency.

EMR #aws #cloud #bigdata #data-analytics A managed cluster platform by AWS for Apache Hadoop and Apache Spark and used mostly for processing data for analytics, BI or to transform data by performing ETL functions.
AWS Glue #aws #cloud A fully managed ETL service by AWS, whihc is used for preparing data for analytics. It runs ETL jobs on fully managed scale-out Apache Spark Environment.

Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (MSK) #aws #cloud #data #streaming Amazon MSK is a fully managed apache kafka service from AWS used for ingesting and processing streaming data in real-time like Kinesis.
Amazon Quantum Ledger Database #aws #cloud #databases Amazon QLDB is a fully managed ledger database that provides a transparent, immutable, and cryptographically verifiable transaction log in AWS.

RDS #aws #cloud #sql #databases #rdbms A fully managed Relational Database Service by AWS. RDS runs on an EC2 instance. A managed relational Database service which supports many RDMS engine which are easy to scale, maintain and update easily.
Redshift #aws #cloud #storage #data-warehouse It is a fully managed Petabase-sized Data Warehouse solution for by AWS. Redshift is singe AZ.
#aws #cloud AWS
AWS IoT 1-Click #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which helps in launching AWS Lambda functions from your simple devices ‚Ä¢ Create actions in the cloud or on premises
AWS IoT Analytics #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which helps in running analytics and get insights from data.

IoT Core #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which helps in connecting devices. ‚Ä¢ Lets you connect IoT devices to the AWS cloud without the need to provision or manage servers ‚Ä¢ Can support billions of devices and trillions of messages
IoT Device Defender #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which helps in auditing configurations, authenticate devices, detect anomalies, and receive alerts to help secure your IoT device fleet
AWS IoT Device Management #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which helps you to register, organize, monitor, and remotely manage IoT devices at scale

AWS IoT Events #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which helps to detect and respond to events from IoT sensors and applications, Ingest data from multiple sources to detect the state of your processes or devices, and proactively manage maintenance schedules.
AWS IoT Greengrass #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which uses Open-source edge runtime and cloud service for building, deploying, and managing device software

AWS IoT SiteWise #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which simplifies collecting, organizing, and analyzing industrial equipment data, organize sensor data streams from multiple production lines and facilities to drive efficiencies across locations

AWS IoT TwinMaker #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS which is formerly AWS IoT Things Graph. Create digital twins of real-world systems such as buildings, factories, industrial equipment, and production lines Quickly pinpoint and address equipment and process anomalies from the plant floor to improve worker productivity and efficiency

The Internet of Things (IoT) #aws #cloud #iot An IoT service from AWS. Describes the network of physical objects that are embedded with sensors or software ‚Ä¢ Each IoT device can communicate and exchange data with other devices and systems ‚Ä¢ Use cases include: ‚Ä¢ Smart home automation ‚Ä¢ Smart healthcare ‚Ä¢ Manufacturing ‚Ä¢ Agriculture

Application Discovery Service #aws #cloud #cloud-migration This is a service from AWS which helps you plan application migration projects. It automatically identifies servers, virtual machines (VMs), and network dependencies in your on-premises data centers.
AWS DataSync #cloud #aws #cloud-migration A data migration service from AWS that helps on moving data securely online between on-premises and AWS storage services ( EFS, S3, FSX) .

Database Migration Service (DMS) #aws #cloud #cloud-migration #databases AWS DMS is a database migration solution by AWS to migrate onprem to cloud or even from any cloud database to another type of database server hosted on cloud.
Migration & Transfer #aws #cloud #cloud-migration Migrating to AWS could be done with seven common migration strategies (7 Rs) for moving applications to the AWS Cloud.
AWS Server Migration Service (SMS) #aws #cloud #cloud-migration It is a managed service from AWS to make migration of on premise service easy to be lifted and shifted to AWS.
Snowball Family #aws #cloud #snowball #storage #cloud-migration This service is for migrating large volume of data to AWS with Low Cost data transfer service (Petabyte Scale).

Storage Gateway #aws #cloud #storage #networking A networking service by AWS which provides a seamless and secure integration between your organization’s on-premise IT environment and AWS’s storage infrastructure.

Amazon Comprehend #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Natural-language processing (NLP) service ‚Ä¢ Uses machine learning to uncover information in unstructured data ‚Ä¢ Can identify critical elements in data, including references to language, people, and places, and the text files can be categorized by relevant topics ‚Ä¢ In real time, you can automatically and accurately detect customer sentiment in your content
AWS Forecast #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Time-series forecasting service ‚Ä¢ Uses ML and is built for business metrics analysis

Amazon Lex #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Conversational AI for Chatbots ‚Ä¢ Build conversational interfaces into any application using voice and text ‚Ä¢ Build bots to increase contact center productivity, automate simple tasks, and drive operational efficiencies across the enterprise

Amazon Polly #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Turns text into lifelike speech ‚Ä¢ Create applications that talk, and build entirely new categories of speech-enabled products ‚Ä¢ Text-to-Speech (TTS) service uses advanced deep learning technologies to synthesize natural sounding human speech

Amazon SageMaker #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: Like Google colab, notebook for AWS Helps data scientists and developers to prepare, build, train, and deploy high-quality machine learning (ML) models ML development activities including: ‚Ä¢ Data preparation ‚Ä¢ Feature engineering ‚Ä¢ Statistical bias detection ‚Ä¢ Auto-ML ‚Ä¢ Training and tuning ‚Ä¢ Hosting ‚Ä¢ Monitoring ‚Ä¢ Workflows

Amazon Textract #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Automatically extract printed text, handwriting, and data from any document ‚Ä¢ Features: ‚Ä¢ Optical character recognition (OCR) ‚Ä¢ Identifies relationships, structure, and text ‚Ä¢ Uses AI to extract text and structured data ‚Ä¢ Recognizes handwriting as well as printed text ‚Ä¢ Can extract from documents such as PDFs, images, forms, and tables ‚Ä¢ Understands context.

Amazon Transcribe #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Add speech to text capabilities to applications ‚Ä¢ Recorded speech can be converted to text before it can be used in applications ‚Ä¢ Uses a deep learning process called automatic speech recognition (ASR) to convert speech to text quickly and accurately

Amazon Translate #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Neural machine translation service that delivers fast, high-quality, and affordable language translation ‚Ä¢ Uses deep learning models to deliver more accurate and more natural sounding translation ‚Ä¢ Localize content such as websites and applications for your diverse users

AWS ML Services #aws #cloud #ai #ml A set of AWS Services which allows use of ML in AWS. Amazon Comprehend Amazon Forecast Amazon Lex Amazon Polly Amazon SageMaker Amazon Textract Amazon Transcribe Amazon Translate AWS Rekognition

AWS Rekognition #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: ‚Ä¢ Add image and video analysis to your applications ‚Ä¢ Identify objects, people, text, scenes, and activities in images and videos ‚Ä¢ Processes videos stored in an Amazon S3 bucket ‚Ä¢ Publish completion status to Amazon SNS Topic

AWS Personal Health Dashboard #aws #cloud ‚Ä¢ AWS Personal Health Dashboard provides alerts and remediation guidance when AWS is experiencing events that may impact you ‚Ä¢ Personal Health Dashboard gives you a personalized view into the performance and availability of the AWS services underlying your AWS resources ‚Ä¢ Also provides proactive notification to help you plan for scheduled activities
AWS Service Health Dashboard #aws #cloud Current status on general AWS services, it is not a personalised dashboard like the AWS Personal Health Dashboard.
CloudTrail #aws #cloud #auditing #logs #monitoring Logs API calls between AWS services. when you need to know who to blame.
Cloudwatch #aws #cloud #monitoring #logs monitoring solution for all of the various AWS resources by AWS. Cloudwatch-Logs Centralized collection of logs.
Amazon Managed Grafana #aws #cloud #monitoring This is a fully managed service by AWS for Grafana, which is an open-source analytics and monitoring solution for databases.
Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus #aws #cloud #monitoring A AWS managed service for Prometheus, which is an open-source monitoring system and time series database.

AWS X-Ray #aws #cloud #monitoring A service from AWS to visualize the components of your application, identify performance bottlenecks, and troubleshoot requests that resulted in an error which will be handy on debugging serverless application.

AWS Client VPN #aws #cloud #networking #vpn AWS Client VPN is a fully-managed remote access VPN solution provided by AWS to be used by your remote workforce to securely access resources within both AWS and your on-premises network.
AWS Global Infrastructure #aws #cloud #networking Regions Geographically distinct Location with AWS datacentres clustered around multiple #Avilability Zones AZ within the same region.
Network ACL (NACL) #aws #cloud #networking A stateless firewall in AWS similar to Security Groups but applies to a subnet level.

AWS Site-to-Site VPN #cloud #aws #networking You can use and AWS an managed IPSec VPN From AWS. It supports a static routes for BGP peering, a Customer Gateway will be used to connect customer site to a VPC uisng an VGW.
AWS VPN CloudHub #aws #cloud #networking #vpn An architectural pattern recommended by AWS, To create AWS Site-to-Site VPNs across multiple customer offices/data centes.

CloudFront #aws #cloud #edge #CDN A CDN service provided by AWS. A CDN is a distributed network of servers which delivers web pages and contents to users based on their geographical location, the origin of the webpage.
Direct Connect Gateway #aws #cloud #networking A free service feature in AWS to be used with AWS DX To add functionality.
Direct Connect (DX) #aws #cloud #networking AWS Direct Connect is a network service that provides an alternative to using the Internet to utilize AWS cloud services.

AWS Global Accelerator (GA) #aws #cloud #networking AWS Global Accelerator is a networking service from AWS that helps you improve the availability, performance, and security of your public applications.
IPv6 #aws #cloud #networking AWS also supports IPv6 in the VPC which required IPv6 CIDR block along with the IPv4 CIDR block.

NAT Gateway #aws #cloud #networking A NAT gateway is AWS managed service which will utilize Network Address Translation (NAT) service. You can use a NAT gateway so that instances in a private subnet can connect to services outside your VPC but external services cannot initiate a connection with those instances.

Route53 #aws #cloud #dns #networking A DNS solution by AWS. Route53 is a DNS similar to Godaddy or Namecheap. ‚Ä¢ You can migrate from another DNS provider and can import records ‚Ä¢ You can migrate a hosted zone to another AWS account ‚Ä¢ You can migrate from Route 53 to another registrar ‚Ä¢ You can also associate a Route 53 hosted zone with a VPC in another account to Authorize association with VPC in the second account.
Security Groups #aws #cloud #networking An AWS stateful firewall service that controls the traffic that is allowed to reach and leave the resources that it is associated with in an instance level.

Storage Gateway #aws #cloud #storage #networking A networking service by AWS which provides a seamless and secure integration between your organization’s on-premise IT environment and AWS’s storage infrastructure.
Transit Gateway #aws #cloud #networking #vpc Simply like a powerful virtual Router like service by AWS. AWS Transit Gateway connects your VPC and on-premises networks through a central hub.

VPC Endpoint #aws #cloud #networking VPC endpoint¬†enables creation of a private connection between VPC to supported AWS services and VPC endpoint services powered by PrivateLink using its private IP address.

VPC Peering #aws #cloud #networking It allows internal connection between VPCs in AWS Using the AWS Global infrastructure. Demo: To create a simple VPC peering connection between two accounts, make two VPC with different root CIDRs (so that the IPs do not collide).

VPC (Virtual Private Cloud) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is a commercial cloud computing service that provides users a virtual private cloud, by ‚Äúprovisioning a logically isolated section of AWS Cloud‚Äù.
Control Tower #aws #cloud #organization Is an extension to AWS Organization provided by AWS, that lets you create a landing zone (a well-architected multi-account baseline)
AWS Organization #aws #cloud #organization An account management service from AWS that lets you consolidate multiple AWS accounts into an organization that you create and centrally manage**.
Service Control Policies #aws #cloud Service control policies (SCPs) is a feature by AWS providing¬†**a type of organization policy that you can use to manage permissions in your AWS Organization.
Service Control Policies #aws #cloud Service control policies (SCPs) are¬†a type of organization policy that you can use to manage permissions in your organization.

Personal Study plan Topic time diff Hybrid Connectivity 80 Hard Storage Services 70 Easy DNS/Cacheing/CDN 70 Easy Databases 70 Med Serverless Application 120 Med Docker/PAAS 120 Med Deployment and Management 120 Med Migration 30 Easy Analytics 40 Hard Monitoring 30 Easy Security 90 Med Total 840 $2=sum(@I.
A AWS SAP C02 exam questions and their explanation
AWS Managed Microsoft AD #aws #cloud #Active-Directory #Microsoft AWS Directory Service lets you run Microsoft Active Directory as a managed service in AWS.

AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) #aws #cloud #security A service fro AWS which lets you easily provision, manage, and deploy public and private SSL/TLS certificates to be used with other AWS services like CloudFormation, Elastic Beanstalk , CloudFront, ELB, etc.
AWS Audit Manager #aws #cloud #security AWS Audit Manager helps you continuously audit your AWS usage to simplify how you assess risk and compliance with regulations and industry standards.

AWS Directory Services #aws #cloud #Active-Directory AWS Directory Service provides multiple directory choices for customers who want to use existing Microsoft Active Directory or Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP)‚Äìaware applications in the cloud via AWS.

AWS GuardDuty #aws #cloud #security Amazon GuardDuty is¬†a threat detection service that continuously monitors your AWS accounts and workloads for malicious activity and delivers detailed security findings for visibility and remediation.
AWS Managed Microsoft AD #aws #cloud #Active-Directory #Microsoft AWS Directory Service lets you run Microsoft Active Directory as a managed service in AWS.
Cloud HSM #aws #cloud #encryption Another service in AWS which allows management of Encryption keys. It is a cloud based hardware security module (HSM).
Amazon Cognito #aws #cloud #security Decentralised way of managing Authentication by AWS. There are two types of pools: Cognito Identity Pools as well as Cognito User Pools

AWS Config #aws #cloud An AWS feature that helps to evaluate the configuration against the desired configurations. It helps in AWS resource inventory, configuration history, and configuration change notifications to use security and governance.

DNS Firewall #aws #cloud #security it is a service by AWS for extending the function of Route53 to perform a sort of Resolver DNS Firewall provides protection for outbound DNS requests from your VPCs.

# IAM Identity Center #cloud #aws #sso #Identity Successor to AWS Single Sign-On. A central management for federated access by AWS which could be used to: ‚Ä¢ Attach multiple AWS accounts and business applications ‚Ä¢ Identities can be in AWS SSO ‚Ä¢ Works with many IdPs (e.
IAM #aws #cloud #security #rbac Identity based management solution by AWS IAM allows management of access of users and resources

Identity Federation #aws #cloud #Iam #Identity Identity Federation Services In AWS we can utilize IAM, AWS IAM Identity Center, and Cognito to create identities and manage roles and permissions by these services.

Amazon Inspector #aws #cloud #security #cloud-security Amazon Inspector is an managed AWS service which provides an automated vulnerability management service that¬†continually scans AWS workloads for software vulnerabilities and unintended network exposure.
KMS #cloud #aws #security AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) lets you create, manage, and control cryptographic keys across your applications and more than 100 AWS services.

Amazon Macie #aws #cloud #security #cloud-security A fully managed data security and data privacy software by AWS. It uses ML and pattern matching algorithms to detect sensitive data that are stored in Amazon S3.
Network Firewall #aws #cloud #security A new feature in AWS for VPC network protection. It Includes Stateful & Stateless firewall, Intrusion Prevention System ( IPS), and Web filtering.
AWS Shield #aws #cloud It is a managed DDoS protection service from AWS. This is used to safeguard web application running on AWS with always-on detection and automatic inline mitigation.
WAF #aws #cloud AWS WAF is a web application firewall WAF by AWS that helps protect apps and APIs against bots and exploits that consume resources, skew metrics, or cause downtime.
AWS Workspace #aws #cloud #Active-Directory A fully managed Virtual Desktop client by AWS Similar to that of AVD. Workspace Client Could be used to sign into the Virtual Desktop setup on EC2.

AWS Storage Services #cloud #aws #storage Block File and Object Storage Systems: Instance Store is a ephemeral storage similar to EBS which exists on the same server rack as the EC2 instance and can be mounted for a high performance Block Storage.

AWS Storage Gateway #aws #cloud #networking #storage AWS Storage Gateway is a set of hybrid cloud storage services provided in AWS that provide on-premises access to virtually unlimited cloud storage.

Elastic Block Storage (EBS) #cloud #aws #storage A device access block storage solution by AWS. Highly available and durable solution for attaching persistent block storage volumes to an EC2 instance.
Elastic File Store (EFS) #aws #cloud #storage #nfs A scalable, Elastic Cloud-native NFS file System offered by AWS. Acts as a single drive which could be utilized by multiple EC2 instances.
EFS #aws #cloud #storage #nfs Scalable, Elastic Cloud-native NFS file System offered by AWS. Acts as a single drive which could be utilized by multiple Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 instances.
Instance Store #cloud #aws #storage Instance Store in AWS is fundamentally different to EBS. These stores are in the same server rack as the EC2 Servers are hosted and are high performance.
Simple Storage Service (S3) #aws #s3 #storage #serverless #cloud Object storage solution provided by AWS. Serverless storage in the cloud. Do not have to worry about the underlying infrastructure
AWS Well-Architected Tool #aws #cloud Review the state of your applications and workloads against architectural best practices provided by AWS to:
Azure Active Directory (AAD) #Azure #Active-Directory #rbac Azure AD is not simply a cloud version of Active Directory in Azure as the name might suggest.
Azure Container Registry (ACR) #Azure #cloud #containers #registry #container-registry #docker It is a simple container registry service provided by Azure. It is similar to ECR Provided by AWS.
Azure App Service #azure #cloud #compute It is a cloud computing based platform for hosting websites in Azure, created and operated by Microsoft.

Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) #cloud #Azure #virtual-machines #compute Azure Virtual Desktop, (formerly known as Windows Virtual Desktop) is a Microsoft Azure-based system for virtualizing its Windows operating systems, aimed at enterprise customers rather than at individual users.
AZ 900 Cloud Concepts 15-25% Azure Core Services 30-35% Security 25-30% Pricing 20-25% 40-60 questions

Azure AD #azure #Active-Directory Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is a directory service provided by Microsoft Azure that enables you to sign in and access both Microsoft cloud applications and cloud applications that you develop.
Azure DNS #Azure #cloud #networking This service is used to manage your DNS records and also host them. Similar to AWS Route53.
Azure Load Balancer #Azure #cloud Is used for evenly distributing incoming network traffic across a group of backend resources or servers using OSI Layer 4 (Transport Layer).
NACL (Network Access Control List) #Azure #cloud #security #acl
NSG (Network Security Groups) #Azure #cloud #security #security-groups An Azure networking firewall like service similar to AWS NSG.
Azure Traffic Manager #Azure #cloud #networking this services operates at the DNS layer to quickly and efficiently direct incoming DNS requests based on the routing method of your choice.
WAF #Azure #cloud #security #waf A cloud native WAF 1 Solution by Azure which protects web-apps from common cyber attacks. Azure WAF consists of and .
Azure Blob Storage #Azure #cloud #storage It is a object storage solution provided by Azure for cloud-native workloads, data archives, data lakes, etc.

Cosmos DB #cloud #Azure #databases Azure SQL Database is a high-performance, reliable, fully managed, and secure relational database based on the latest stable version of the Microsoft SQL Server database engine provided by Azure.
Azure DNS #Azure #cloud #networking This service is used to manage your DNS records and also host them. Similar to AWS Route53 in Azure.

DP-900 #Azure #cloud #dataanalytics #datawarehousing Azure exam prep Core Data related Azure Services Azure Storage Explorer (To explore Azure Storage accounts) Azure Synapse Analytics Azure Data Lake Storage Azure Data Analytics Azure Data Box Azure Databricks (Apache spark 3rd party) Microsoft Power BI (Dashboards) HDInsight (fully managed Hadoop) Azure Data Studio (IDE like VSCode for data related tasks similar to SSIS) Azure Data Factory (ETL/ELT pipeline builder) SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) Azure Data Roles Data Engineer Tools Data Overview Data Basically Information

Cheet Sheets #Azure #cloud Azure certification for data foundations DP-900 done after DP 900 Power BI Data Cheetsheets Relational Databases Account Storage CosmosDB Azure Synapse and Data Lake Hadoop Spark and DataBricks SQL Management Studio (SSMS) Database Security
NSG (Network Security Groups) #Azure #cloud #security #security-groups An Azure networking firewall like service similar to AWS NSG.
Resource Groups (Azure) #Azure #cloud #organization A required grouping tag for all of the Azure services. It helps in organizing the resources.
Azure SQL Database #cloud #Azure #databases Azure SQL Database is a PaaS deployment option of Azure SQL that abstracts both the OS and the SQL Server instance provided by Azure.

Subscriptions #Azure #cloud An Azure subscription is¬†a logical container used to provision resources in Azure. It holds the details of all your resources like virtual machines (VMs), databases, and more.
Azure Traffic Manager #Azure #cloud #networking A service from Azure to operate at the DNS layer to quickly and efficiently direct incoming DNS requests based on the routing method of your choice.
VM (Virtual Macines) #Azure #cloud #compute It is a simple compute service provided by Azure to host VMs in a VNET.
VNET (Virtual Network) #Azure #cloud An Azure¬†Virtual Network (VNet) is a network or environment that can be used to run VMs and applications in the cloud.
WAF #Azure #cloud #security #waf A cloud native WAF 1 Solution by Azure which protects web-apps from common cyber attacks. Azure WAF consists of and .

Cloud Networking #cloud #networking Cloud computing has changed what we know about software design and the role/functions of data centers. The journey to the cloud begins with choosing a cloud provider and provisioning private networks or extending their on-premise network.
